lead_paragraph: Grass court or hard court, it didn't seem to matter to Bob and Mike Bryan on Saturday when the brothers, after a mid-match lapse, gave the United States a 2-1 lead over Australia in their World Group Davis Cup first-round tie.

headline.print_headline: Bryan Brothers Give US 2-1 Davis Cup Lead Over Australia
headline.main: Bryan Brothers Give US 2-1 Davis Cup Lead Over Australia
